feed.title: OpnForm Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: UI improvements - email reply to fix
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Form Editor v2.5 by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/599
  • fix undefined error on integrations by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/601
  • improve email notfication migration by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/602
  • Fix email notification reply to by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/603

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.4.0...v1.4.1

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: Fix Icon bug
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ESC-365] = on fetch submission data display error if there by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/608

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.4.3 Fix matrix + bump client dep
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Right to left mode by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/611
  • Matrix Improvements by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/606

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.4.2...v1.4.3
